text: aldhyn yahmilun earsh alrhmn min almalayikat wman hawl alearsh mmn yhf bih mnhm, ynzzihwn allah ean kl nqs, wyhmadwnh bima hu 'ahl lh, wayuminun bih haqa al'iyman, wytlbwn minh 'an yaefu ean almwmnyn, qaylyn: rabana wasiet kula shay' rahmatan welmana, faghfir liladhin tabuu min alshirk walmeasy, wslku altariq aldhy 'amartahum 'ana yslkwh wahu al'islam, wjannibhm eadhab alnaar wahwalha
